chapter.title: Xorg Drivers
chapter.para: This section contains the instructions for building Xorg drivers that are necessary in order for Xorg Server to take the advantage of the hardware that it is running on. At least one input and one video driver is required for Xorg Server to start.

note.para: If you are unsure which video hardware you have, you can use lspci from to find out which video hardware you have and then look at the descriptions of the packages in order to find out which driver you need.
